author: Arek Sarkissian
title: Florida expands quarantine to visitors from Louisiana
description: Texas and Rhode Island have followed the governor's lead.
content:
Ron DeSantis. | AP Photo/John Raoux
TALLAHASSEE Florida will set up road checkpoints along the Panhandle border to direct motorists who have been to Louisiana to quarantine, escalating efforts by Gov. Ron DeSantis to keep visitors from coronavirus "hot spots… [+3306 chars]
